text: Margaret L. "Peg" Murray (February 14, 1924 – November 29, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Denver, Colorado. She won a Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance as the villain "Fräulein Kost" in the original Broadway production of Cabaret (1966). Murray died on November 29, 2020 in Southold, New York at the age of 96.From Broadway to Southold, Peg Murray inspired a love of performance and connection ==References== Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Denver Category:Actors from New York City
title: Peg Murray
